item.title: Prince Philip: My family and other animals
item.author: HRH the Duke of Edinburgh,
item.description: It may be a surprise that you find me in this pokey newspaper, so let me elucidate. During the festive season, I spotted a copy of Felix residing by one of the house/palace windows. I flicked through a few pages to be simply aghast at the clap trap rubbish contained within, not excluding the hideous â€¦
